title: Cahokia and Swahili development and regional trade

content.prompt: Which of the following most encouraged the development of new cities such as Cahokia along the Mississippi River, Swahili city-states on the East African Coast, Venice on the Mediterranean coast, and Hangzhou on Chinaâ€™s coast during the period 600 C.E. to 1450 C.E.?

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
